Ailert needs your location to share it with emergency responders and trusted contacts when you activate an emergency.
Ailert needs continuous location access to track your position during an emergency and share it with responders.
Ailert needs background location access to continue tracking during emergencies even when the app is in the background.
Ailert uses the camera to record video evidence during emergencies that can be shared with authorities.
Ailert uses the microphone to record audio during emergencies and detect distress sounds.
Ailert uses speech recognition so you can talk to the AI coordinator hands-free during an emergency.
Ailert uses motion sensors to detect falls, impacts, and sudden movements that may indicate an emergency.
Ailert uses fall detection to automatically identify when you may have fallen and need help.
Ailert can access your health information to share critical medical data with emergency responders.
Ailert may record health data during emergency events.
Ailert needs access to your contacts to set up trusted emergency contacts.
Ailert saves captured photos and videos from emergencies to your photo library.
